product_name: REI Bear Hug Fleece Infant Suit - Infant Boys'
long_description: The heavyweight fleece REI Bear Hug fleece infant suit swaddles tiny snow fans in adorable warmth. Plush, polyester fleece is soft and comfortable, dries quickly and continues to insulate even when damp. Front zipper extends from chin down to foot for easy dressing; full-length zipper guard keeps zipper away from sensitive skin. Hood with elastic trim keeps child's head warm. Sleeve and leg cuffs fold over to protect little hands and feet; nylon/Lycra(R) spandex binding around cuffs seals in warmth. Gusseted crotch and 3-panel hood enhance the fit. .
